org.cloudifysource.dsl.context
Interface ServiceContext

public interface ServiceContext

Context interface, available in the service recipe.

Author:
barakme

waitForService

Service waitForService(String name,
                       int timeout,
                       TimeUnit unit)
Waits for the specified period of time until the service with the given name becomes available.

Parameters:
name - the service name.
timeout - the timeout.
unit - the unit of time used with the timeout.
Returns:
the Service.
